text: 15.55 Development proposals for affordable workspace are expected to meet the following standards: z development proposals should accommodate with regular plan and flexibility for either open-plan or more compartmentalised modes of occupation; z all internal walls to be plastered and painted; z all soffits and structural columns to be exposed fair-faced polished concrete or plastered and painted; z where thermal/acoustic insulation is applied to soffits, finish suitable for decoration; z installation of mechanical and electrical services – including ventilation, heating and basic fire detection systems; z installation of toilets and a kitchenette(s); z power supply outlets and data cabling points – provision should assume a demand based on maximum possible occupancy; Tower Hamlets Local Plan 239 INCLUSIVE ECONOMY AND GOOD GROWTH z raised floors and boxes – floors should have a minimum 5kN loading capacity (4+1kN);
